about_the_game:
Advance to the next floor.
Identify the anomaly.
Make your choice.


You attempt to use the elevator, yet you're met with an eerily familiar hallway each time: identical cardboard boxes, the same woman smoking in her bathrobe, the same unchanging view.

But is it truly identical? The challenge is to recognize the anomaly, the subtle and sometimes not-so-subtle difference that will allow you to move to the next level.

Is the coast clear? Press 0 in the elevator to proceed. Notice an anomaly? Something extraordinary or surreal? Stay composed and press B to peel back a layer of reality.

Strive to reach level 0 to escape and achieve freedom in this compact immersive first-person puzzle game.

Play Time

15 - 60 Minutes

Features

  • Over 30 unique events after the elevator doors open.
  • A catchy elevator tune you won't forget.
  • Hidden endings that are tough to find.

content_descriptors.notes: Elevator Zero is a horror game and contains elements that are not suitable for children or people who are sensitive to disturbing content, such as: Tobacco use, implied violence and general adult themes.

name: Elevator Zero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: In Elevator Zero, a first-person exploration and puzzle game, you find yourself trapped in an otherworldly dimension. Escape is possible only through the elevator.
